alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sherman County through 1130 PM MDT... At 1100 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northeast of Kanorado, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Sherman County. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 5 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
